TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class EditorPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 用作位于 区域中的控件的基类，用于编辑 控件。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones and are used to edit controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类提供一组基本的属性和所用的方法由派生提供与 Web 部件控件集，并由自定义控件控件。The class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom controls. 控件允许用户编辑关联通过修改其布局、 外观、 属性、 行为或其他特征的控件。An control allows a user to edit an associated control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics. 编辑的用户界面 (UI)，其中包括区域包含控制，Web 页进入编辑模式后，将显示。The editing user interface (UI), which consists of zones that contain controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 仅在从派生的区域中，可以使用控件类，如控件。An control can be used only within a zone that derives from the class, such as the control. 页进入编辑模式后，用户可选择控件，以编辑通过单击所选控件的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词。After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control. 只有一个可以一次编辑控件。Only one control can be edited at a time. 多个派生控件所提供的 Web 部件控件集，如以下表中列出。Several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table. 这些控件提供所需的大多数应用程序的所有编辑功能。These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications. 在 Web 部件页中使用这些控件的典型方法是将其声明在中以页持久性格式``元素，其中``子元素的``元素。The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `` element, where `` is the child element of an `` element. 有关代码示例，请参阅本主题的示例部分。For a code example, see the Example section of this topic. |控件的类型Type of control|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||编辑关联的控件，包括属性，例如其标题文本、 高度、 宽度和边框属性的外观。Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| ||编辑关联控件，例如是否可以对其进行编辑，是否可以关闭它，或是否可以移到另一个区域的某些行为。Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone. 在共享的个性化设置范围内所编辑的控件时，此控件才页上可见。This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| ||编辑关联控件，如是否处于正常或最小化 （折叠） 状态，以及哪个区域的布局属性位于中。Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| ||如果使用的源代码中声明这些属性编辑的关联控件的属性`WebBrowsable`属性。Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，所有控制提供在 Web 部件控件集内呈现`
`元素。To improve accessibility, all the controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素中用于编辑的控件的相关的集分组给定控件使用，而且可以简化这些控件之间为可视用户代理 （如普通的 Web 浏览器） 和语音的用户代理的选项卡式的导航（例如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of controls. 此代码示例包含四个部分：This code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面具有多个控件控件从该区域，以及对自定义的引用中设置声明的 Web 部件控件控件。A Web page that contains an control, with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义类控制和自定义控件以供编辑中的属性控件。A class that contains the custom control, and a custom control for editing a property in the control. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#14)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#14)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的声明性引用控件，其中的子``元素，其中包含对两个 Web 部件控件集的声明性引用控件。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to two of the Web Parts control set controls. 该页还引用自定义控件，并使用`Register`程序集指令和``控件元素。The page also references a custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#12)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#12)] 代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义类名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此类应实现接口。The class implements the interface. 在此类是包含专用的代码的嵌套的私有类类与关联`TextDisplayWebPart`类，名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。Within this class is a nested, private class that contains the code for a private class associated with the `TextDisplayWebPart` class and named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 在运行时，作为`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式，在其`TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts`方法，它创建的一个实例`TextDisplayEditorPart`类，并将其显示控件，以及其他控件。At run time, as the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode, in its `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` method, it creates an instance of the `TextDisplayEditorPart` class, and displays it in the control, along with the other controls. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 加载页在浏览器中，以及**显示模式**控件中，选择**编辑模式**以切换到编辑模式。Load the page in a browser, and on the **Display Mode** control, select **Edit Mode** to switch to edit mode. 单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，您可以看到三个控件，包括使您能够编辑自定义一个`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性。When the editing UI is visible, you can see three controls, including the custom one that enables you to edit the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. 如果编辑的用户界面和单击进行一些更改**应用**按钮，您可以使用下拉列表控件返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看完整的编辑更改的效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

para.span: 若要创建自定义控件，必须重写两个重要方法。

span.span: To create a custom control, you must override two important methods.

para.span: 方法将应用到编辑器控件中所做的更改控制正在编辑。

span.span: The method applies changes made in the editor control to the control being edited.

para.span: 方法获取的当前值控制正在编辑，以便编辑器控件可以编辑它们。

span.span: The method gets the current values of the control being edited, so that the editor control can edit them.

para.span: 使用这两种关键方法，可以获取并设置您的自定义之间的值控件和正在编辑的控件。

span.span: Using these two critical methods, you get and set values between your custom control and the control it is editing.

para.span: 如果从其中派生类来创建自定义编辑器控件，你可以添加到自定义控件通过实现区域接口中控件、 一个用户控件或服务器控件。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create custom editor controls, you can add your custom controls to an zone by implementing the interface in a control, a user control, or a server control.

para.span: 有关更多详细信息和代码示例，请参阅类概述。

span.span: For more details and a code example, see the class overview.

para.span: 此外，示例部分中的代码示例演示如何实现在自定义控件。

span.span: Also, the code example in the Example section demonstrates how to implement in a custom control.
Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

Public MustOverride Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean

summary.span: 将 控件中的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values in an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on an control. 它被定义为抽象方法中类，并且必须由继承的控件实现。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 该方法的用途是保存用户输入的值控件中的对应属性中引用的控件属性。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an control to the corresponding properties in the control that is referenced in the property. 用户单击表示为确定或编辑用户界面 (UI) 中的应用谓词的按钮时调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中自定义方法控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现方法在自定义类名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 此方法获取对关联的引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用属性。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 然后，它更新的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性。It then updates the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#5)] 代码示例的第二部分显示了如何关联控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，创建的集合相关联控件 (在这种情况下，还有一个仅控件命名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中其实现方法。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 执行此方法时`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 从派生的类类必须实现方法。

span.span: A class that derives from the class must implement the method.

para.span: 实现的方法获取对关联的控件使用的引用属性，并使用中的当前值更新该控件的属性控件。

span.span: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the property, and then updates the properties of that control with the current values in the control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中编辑的特定点处理，包含的区域控制检查属性来确定是否显示控件。At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an control checks the property to determine whether to display the control. 有两种方案其中属性返回`false`和不显示控件。There are two scenarios where the property returns `false` and the control is not displayed. 第一种情形发生时正在编辑的控件是控件。The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a control. 当正在编辑的控件时，会第二个方案及其并属性设置为`true`，而在用户级别设置页的个性化设置范围。The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its and properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含 控件的标题栏中显示的标题文本。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an control.

value.span: 一个表示控件的完整可见标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的当前值的基本属性或如果该控件没有标题，计算得出的值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 无标题控件的可本地化资源字符串包含的计算的值。The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls. 在其中没有值分配给的情况下属性中，值属性不同于属性。In the cases where no value is assigned to the property, the value of the property differs from the property. 因为属性旨在作为一个只读的要在运行时，获取实际显示的标题的当前值的计算的属性不要尝试使用此属性设置为标题控件。Because the property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an control. 若要设置标题，请使用基属性。To set a title, use the base property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 检索 控件的父区域的当前状态。

span.span: Retrieves the current state of an control's parent zone.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中具有包含 控件的 区域的当前状态。

span.span: An that has the current state of the zone that contains an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含该区域的状态信息控件。The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an control. 在字典中的窗体中返回的状态信息。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了调用基方法，方法还会检查属性。In addition to calling the base method, the method also checks the property. 如果值为`false`，这意味着，应该不会显示该控件，则属性也设置为`false`。If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the property is also set to `false`.

exception.span: 包含 控件的 为 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SyncChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 从 控件检索其关联 控件的属性值。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control for its associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on an control. 它被定义为抽象方法中类，并且必须由继承的控件实现。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 此方法的用途是检索中的当前值控件中引用属性，并更新中的字段使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the control referenced in the property, and update the fields in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 调用方法时在关联的值控件可能已更改。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于每个控件，包含控件调用区域方法后立即调用方法，以便中的值控件始终同步中的值关联控件。For every control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一种情况其中调用方法时控件进入编辑模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 不会调用方法后方法，如果该方法返回`false`，因为在这种情况下，出现错误。The method is not called after the method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中自定义方法控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现方法在自定义类名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 此方法获取对关联的引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用属性。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 然后，它获取的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性，然后在下拉列表控件中选择哪一项的更新 (通过引用`TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle`属性) 对自定义控件。It then gets the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property, and updates which item is selected in the drop-down list control (referenced by the `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` property) on the custom control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#6)] 代码示例的第二部分显示了如何关联控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，创建的集合相关联控件 (在这种情况下，还有一个仅控件命名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中其实现方法。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 执行此方法时`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 实现的方法获取对关联的控件使用的引用属性，然后更新从关联的属性值的控件控件。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对与当前网页关联的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control associated with the current Web page.
A reference to the on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件需要对引用实例，因为它必须检查页后，可以确定的值的当前个性化设置范围属性。An control needs a reference to the instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the property. 通过检查来确定个性化设置范围属性，用于通过访问属性。Personalization scope is determined by checking the property, which is accessed through the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对当前正在编辑的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.

value.span: 当前处于编辑模式中的 。

span.span: A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件 （或其他服务器或用户控件） 这是当前正在编辑对应的值属性。The control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the property. 只有一个时，并且当控件处于编辑模式，可以编辑控件属性提供对该控件的引用。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 之后添加了区域控制到它的控件集合，它将赋的值属性设置为属性上的控件。After the zone has added the control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own property to the property on the control. 控件使用尤其是在其两个关键方法--属性和-若要获取和设置关联控件的属性值。An control uses the property especially in its two critical methods-- and --to get and set the property values on the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As EditorZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对包含 控件的 区域的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the zone that contains an control.
An that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管属性是只读的它提供对包含的区域对象的引用控件中，可以以编程方式更改对区域本身的属性值。Although the property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
